    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_78656</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_78656</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Centripetal forces on a bicycle turning a corner</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zentripetale Kräfte auf einem Fahrrad, das eine 
Ecke dreht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forces centripètes sur une bicyclette tournant 
un coin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Forças centripetal em uma bicicleta que gira um 
canto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forze centripete su una bicicletta che gira un 
angolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κεντρομόλες δυνάμεις σε ένα ποδήλατο που γυρίζει μια 
γωνία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerzas centrípetas en una bicicleta que da 
vuelta a una esquina</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how friction can provide centripetal force on the tyres of a bicycle as it turns a corner.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bicycle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">centripetal force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circular motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circular path</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">friction forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Road</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tyres</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Friktion zentripetale 
Kraft auf den Reifen eines Fahrrades zur Verfügung stellen kann, 
während sie eine Ecke dreht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment le frottement 
peut fournir la force centripète sur les pneus d'une bicyclette 
pendant qu'il tourne un coin.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como a fricção pode 
fornecer a força centripetal nos tyres de uma bicicleta enquanto gira
um canto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come l'attrito può 
fornire la forza centripeta sui pneumatici di una bicicletta mentre 
gira un angolo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς η τριβή μπορεί να 
παρέχει την κεντρομόλο δύναμη στα ελαστικά αυτοκινήτου ενός 
ποδηλάτου καθώς γυρίζει μια γωνία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo la fricción 
puede proporcionar a la fuerza centrípeta en los neumáticos de una 
bicicleta mientras que da vuelta a una esquina.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fahrrad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">zentripetale Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
